guessDelimiters(text, possibleDelimiters) → {array}

Guess the delimiters of an input string by counting the most frequent one.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
text string

input string to search
possibleDelimiters array

array of delimiters (as characters)
Source:
  • parserCSV.js, line 13
Returns:

delimiters finded ordered by frequency of appearance

Type
array

serializeJSON(currentKey, currentObject, result, isArray, isObject)

Serialize the json to have just one level. Convert array and objects as a final string and change the name of the columns Here is an example of before and after the input is serialize

Parameters:
Name Type Description
currentKey string

the current key of the object browsing
currentObject Object

the json object who need to be serialized
result Object

the json object serialized (need to be initalized to: var res = {})
isArray Boolean

need to be initialized to false. It will be true if the current subobject is an array
isObject Boolean

need to be initialized to false. It will be true if the current subobject is an object
Source:
  • parserJSON.js, line 27
Examples
{
 "ex" : {
           "1" : "test",
           "2" : "ok"
        }
}
{
  "ex_1" : "test",
  "ex_2" : "ok"
}
